text:
a New Hebrew Translation for "Test Page for Apache Installation" : It Replaces 
the Old 1.3.x style oldie - and It's now much Clearer !

I'm going through the bug db to make sure patches are findable.  Please see 
http://httpd.apache.org/dev/patches.html
creator: trawick@apache.org

text:
We are getting rid of these welcome pages in future versions because they are
too difficult to maintain.  But thanks for your contribution.
creator: slive@apache.org
